playwright.description: Opens and interacts with websites using a headless browser. Useful for visiting URLs and clicking elements, but may not bypass bot protection on sites like Google or ChatGPT.

airbnb.description: Queries Airbnb listings and travel-related data. Use for travel-related questions or booking info.

duckduckgo-search.description: Searches the web using DuckDuckGo. Use this for any general-purpose information search or query.

mongodb.description: Get live cryptocurrency data like prices,market cap,and 24h changes for tokens like Bitcoin, Ethereum,etc.
